name: Random Daily Fact
description: A website that displays a new fact every day with nice styling. You can enable notifications so that every day, it reminds you to look at the new fact and shows you a new fact. It is also a PWA, so you can install it on any platform as an app.

name: Pixel Art Maker
description: A website to make pixel art with. You can use different grid dimensions, tools (like line, eraser, fill), colour picker (RGBAHSL, CSS input, native picker) with colour storage. You can export as a .pxart file to edit later, or a PNG.

name: Circles Animation
description: An interactive display of patterns within easing. Generate circles swaying side to side, and adjust / export the settings

name: Wealth Comparer
description: See how long it would take you to have as much money as the richest people, with a reference timescale. You can type in a yearly salary or have it calculated. Available in English, French, and Spanish. Uses the Forbes 400 API.

name: Jump Game
description: A game where you jump over / duck under blocks to get as far as you can. You can play as different sprites. It gets progressively harder in many ways.

name: Spinning Arcs
description: Generate nice animations of arcs spinning. You can control the speed, colour, size, and more.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: Play tic tac toe either against a computer with 4 difficulty levels ranging from very easy to impossible, against a friend on the same device, or create a room and share the code so your friends can play with you - even if they're not there with you.

name: Click game
description: Hit the spacebar just as the moving bar is in the green zone to get points.

name: Note Taker
description: Type text and hit enter for it to be saved. Can also solve mathematical expressions, and store single-lettered variables for reuse. Comes with different themes.

name: JS Tips
description: A website filled with often overlooked features of JavaScript with a great navigation system.

name: Periodic Table
description: A periodic table using the https://neelpatel05.pythonanywhere.com API. Built in React, scales nicely, and you can click on an element to see more info. This was a collaboration between me and a friend.

name: Balance Tracker
description: A site where you can create different portfolios and update your balance for each portfolio. You can see the new balance, time updated, net increase, and percentage increase. It generates graphs using D3 to show you your balance over time.
